00014 //: Searches along a profile using normalised correlation.
00015 class mfpf_norm_corr1d : public mfpf_point_finder
00016 {
00017  private:

00019   int ilo_;
00020   //: Kernel mask is [ilo_,ihi_]
00021   int ihi_;

00054   //: Evaluate match at p, using u to define scale and orientation
00055   // Returns -1*edge strength at p along direction u
00056   virtual double evaluate(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00057                           const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00058                           const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u);
00059 
00060   //: Evaluate match at in a region around p
00061   // Returns a quality of fit at a set of positions.
00062   // response image (whose size and transform is set inside the
00063   // function), indicates the points at which the function was
00064   // evaluated.  response(i,j) is the fit at the point
00065   // response.world2im().inverse()(i,j).  The world2im() transformation
00066   // may be affine.
00067   virtual void evaluate_region(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00068                                const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00069                                const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u,
00070                                vimt_image_2d_of<double>& response);
00071 
00072   //: Search given image around p, using u to define scale and orientation
00073   //  On exit, new_p and new_u define position, scale and orientation of
00074   //  the best nearby match.  Returns a quality of fit measure at that
00075   //  point (the smaller the better).
00076   virtual double search_one_pose(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00077                                  const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00078                                  const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u,
00079                                  vgl_point_2d<double>& new_p);
00080 
00081   //: Generate points in ref frame that represent boundary
00082   //  Points of a contour around the shape.
00083   //  Used for display purposes.
00084   virtual void get_outline(vcl_vector<vgl_point_2d<double> >& pts) const;
00085
